Author: paperklipp
Text: Fitbits tend to overestimate burn by quite a lot. I think they did a study and it was by up to 33%, you could find more by googling if youâ€™re interested. Apple Watches are the most accurate counters by a long shot.

Author: LowCalPal
Text: I believe it could be 588.  That's how much you'd burn in two hours of slow walking.
